name: Metabolic Fatigue Syndrome
chief_complaint: I feel exhausted all the time, no matter how much I sleep
prognosis: Good with early intervention and lifestyle changes, though recovery may take 3-6 months
description: A subclinical metabolic disorder characterized by chronic fatigue without clear organic cause, often related to modern lifestyle factors including poor sleep patterns, nutritional deficiencies, and chronic low-grade stress. Distinct from chronic fatigue syndrome by its reversible nature with preventive interventions.
